sentences.en: Also, the further an executive rises, the more he or she must deal with high-caliber people who know how to get what they want, are difficult, strong-willed and have a sharp appetite for power.
sentences.cn: 此外，管理者升迁到越高的位置，他/她就必须越多地与更有才干的人打交道，这些人知道如何得到自己想要的，他们往往难以相处，意志坚定，有更强的权力欲。

sentences.en: Criticism and education, when children want their parents the same caliber.
sentences.cn: 批评教育孩子时父母口径要一致.

sentences.en: He is a statesman of the highest caliber.
sentences.cn: 他是一位才能卓越的政治家.

sentences.en: Methods: Using heavy caliber capillary gas chromatography with headspace sampling.
sentences.cn: 方法: 采用顶空进样技术,用大口径毛细管气相色谱法测定.

sentences.en: One of the criminals immediately shoved a .38 caliber handgun to my head, ordered me to the cooler, pushed me down on the floor, and pumped a bullet into the back of my head - execution style.
sentences.cn: 其中一个匪徒迅速掏出一把口径为38毫米的手枪用力指著我的头，勒令我走到冷冻机旁，然后把我推倒在地，像执行死刑般从后面朝我头部开了一枪。

sentences.en: Perhaps the first thing that students notice about their college is the caliber of their fellow students.
sentences.cn: 可能学生们对这所大学关注的第一件事就是同学的才干。

sentences.en: Technology companies understand that teenagers are capable of producing high - caliber work.
sentences.cn: 科技公司了解到,青少年能够做出卓越的工作.

sentences.en: The caliber of the students has gone from mediocre to above average.
sentences.cn: 学生的品质已经从平庸水平升到了超出一般的水平.

sentences.en: The caliber of the vein and the artery to which it was anastomosed was similar.
sentences.cn: 用同等口径的动静脉吻合.

sentences.en: The gonadal arteries are generally of relatively small caliber.
sentences.cn: 一般来说,生殖腺动脉的内径都相对较小.

sentences.en: The Mexico City Philharmonic Orchestra sounded like an orchestra of international caliber.
sentences.cn: 墨西哥城爱乐乐团已经具有国际级交响乐团的水准.

sentences.en: The quality of his character and the caliber of his accomplishments produced a lasting influence.
sentences.cn: 他的优秀品格和卓越成就影响深远。

sentences.en: There are few workers left of her caliber.
sentences.cn: 像她那种工作人员剩下的不多了.

sentences.en: There is no other player even remotely approaching her caliber.
sentences.cn: 就才干而言,其他选手远远赶不上她.

sentences.en: They ought to win with players of such high caliber.
sentences.cn: 他们选手的能力这样高,应该获胜.

sentences.en: We are always trying to improve the caliber of our schools.
sentences.cn: 我们一直在想方设法提高我们学校的水平.

sentences.en: We are now seeking high caliber persons to join our Sales Team.
sentences.cn: 我们现正在寻找适合的人士去加入我们的销售行列.

sentences.en: What caliber gun was used to shoot the vargas brothers?
sentences.cn: 打中维加斯兄弟的枪是多少口径的?

trans.tran_cn: 口径，能力，水准，枪弹的直径
